channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 15:50 PM anxiety in the Odesa region. Stop by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 15:50 PM anxiety in the Odesa region. Stop by further messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 15:28 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 15:28 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
